content.raw:
I'm guessing that the trailing digits on the significands of these floating point literals are meant to deal with floating point imprecision. However, the `EXPECT_DOUBLE_EQ` macro should already take care of that for us.

I recommend that we put the exact value that we expect in these test expressions, and allow the macro to take care of the floating point complications.

I made a commit to take care of this: 5df7f6b Feel free to merge that if it looks good. I verified that the test still passes with those changes on my machine.
